statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerInformation;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM CustomerInformation;
SELECT customer_id, address FROM CustomerInformation WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInformation WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT first_name, contact_number FROM CustomerInformation ORDER BY contact_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInformation WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, contact_number FROM CustomerInformation WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInformation WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, address FROM CustomerInformation ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, contact_number FROM CustomerInformation WHERE first_name = 'John' OR last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_contact_number FROM customers WHERE customer_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_contact_number LIKE '123%';
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT order_id, total_amount, order_date FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;

SELECT customer_name, customer_address, order_date FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY customer_name ASC, order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_contact_number FROM customers WHERE customer_contact_number LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;

SELECT customer_name, customer_address, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC, customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS order_count FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(order_id) > 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT oi.order_id, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.price_per_unit FROM order_items oi JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE id = 3;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, description, price FROM products WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, price_per_unit FROM order_items WHERE quantity >= 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM addresses WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customers WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%' OR last_name LIKE 'T%';
SELECT order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount < 1000 AND order_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, total_amount FROM orders INNER JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity, subtotal FROM order_items INNER JOIN products ON order_items.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT customer_id, CONCAT(first_name, ' ', last_name) AS full_name, city, state, postal_code FROM customers INNER JOIN addresses ON customers.customer_id = addresses.customer_id;
